original_text: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.
korean_text: 그러므로 의인은 그 길을 꾸준히 가고 손이 깨끗한 자는 점점 힘을 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: The righteous also shall hold on his way
sentences.korean_translation: 의인도 또한 자신의 길을 지켜나갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: and he that hath clean hands
